components.name: tiqFpA
components.content: Welcome to the Day 1 Questionnaire for the H1N2 response. This questionnaire is for Cases.

components.name: P1Q3
components.title: Interviewers Telephone Number
components.hint: If not a UK phone number, please add the country code

components.name: tiqGpA
components.content: Tell us if the respondent is the subject of this case report.

components.name: P2Q3
components.title: What is the respondents relationship to the case subject

components.name: P3Q2
components.title: Date of Death
components.hint: If the case has died, please enter the date of death

components.name: P3Q3
components.title: If the case has died, was Influenza AH1N2 a contribution to Death

components.name: P3Q22
components.title: Healthcare Worker with Direct Patient Care

components.name: P3Q23
components.title: Other Health or Social Care or Laboratory Work Without Direct Patient Care

components.name: P3Q25
components.title: Does the case work with animals

components.name: P3Q27
components.title: In the 7 days before symptom onset, or a positive test, how many times did you work or attend an educational setting outside the home (any occupation)

components.name: P4Q1
components.title: What was the reason for the case to test for H1N2

components.name: P4Q3
components.title: Do you know how the case might have acquired the infection

components.name: P4Q4
components.title: Is the case part of an institutional outbreak

components.name: P4Q6
components.title: Did the case attend a mass gathering event in the 7 days before onset

components.name: P4Q8
components.title: Did the case attend a healthcare facility in the 7 days before your symptoms started

components.name: P4Q10
components.title: Has the case had contact with a confirmed or suspected case in the 7 days before symptom onset or a positive test

components.name: P6Q1
components.title: In the 7 days before before symptom onset or a positive test did the case travel

components.name: P6Q2
components.title: If so, how many places did you visit

components.name: P7Q4
components.title: Travel details to location
components.hint: e.g. train journey or flight no

components.name: P7Q5
components.title: Travel details from location
components.hint: e.g. train journey or flight no

components.name: P8Q1
components.title: In the 7 days before onset or a positive test did the case have close contact with pigs (live or dead)

components.name: P8Q2
components.title: If yes, what was the location of the contact

components.name: P8Q3
components.title: Has the case had contact with any other animals in the last 7 days

components.name: P8Q4
components.title: If yes, what was the location of the contact

components.name: tiqGpA
components.content: Tell us if the case has shown any symptoms, we will capture further details on the next page.

components.name: P9Q1
components.title: Has the case shown any symptoms

components.name: P10Q1
components.title: What date did the case first experience any symptoms

components.name: P10Q2
components.title: Fever or history of fever or chills

components.name: P10Q3
components.title: If yes, when did that symptom start

components.name: P10Q5
components.title: If yes, when did that symptom start

components.name: P10Q8
components.title: If yes, when did that symptom start

components.name: P10Q10
components.title: If yes, when did that symptom start

components.name: P10Q12
components.title: If yes, when did that symptom start

components.name: P10Q14
components.title: If yes, when did that symptom start

components.name: P10Q24
components.title: Does the case still have any respiratory symptoms

components.name: P10Q25
components.title: If no, when did they recover

components.name: P11Q1
components.title: Does the case consider their infection to date to have been mild, moderate or severe

components.name: P11Q2
components.content: Has the case accessed any healthcare services during the illness

components.name: P11Q6
components.title: Was the case admitted to hospital

components.name: P11Q7
components.title: If yes, what date were they admitted

components.name: P11Q8
components.title: If hospitalised, what was the reason for their hospital admission

components.name: P11Q9
components.title: Is the case still currently in hospital

components.name: P11Q10
components.title: If no, what date were they discharged

components.name: P11Q11
components.title: If you don't know your discharge date, how many days were you hospitalised for

components.name: P11Q12
components.title: Did the case receive oxygen in hospital

components.name: P11Q13
components.title: Was the case admitted to the Intensive Care Unit

components.name: P11Q14
components.title: If yes, what was the date of their admission

components.name: P11Q15
components.title: Did the case receive care involving a ventilator

components.name: P12Q1
components.title: Did the case receive oseltamivir in the last 14 days

components.name: P12Q2
components.title: If yes, what date was this started

components.name: P12Q3
components.title: If yes, what date was this finished

components.name: P12Q4
components.title: Did the case receive zanamivir in the last 14 days

components.name: P12Q5
components.title: If yes, what date was this started

components.name: P12Q6
components.title: If yes, what date was this finished

components.name: P12Q7
components.title: Did the case receive other antivirals in the last 14 days

components.name: P12Q8
components.title: If yes, how many antivirals were administered

components.name: tiqApA
components.content: Tell us what other antivirals the case has taken excluding the previously mentioned oseltamivir and zanamivir.

components.name: P13Q1
components.title: Please specify the name of the antiviral

components.name: P13Q2
components.title: What date did you start taking the antiviral

components.name: P13Q3
components.title: What date did you finish taking the antiviral

components.name: tiqApA
components.content: Tell us if the case has any medical history we should be aware of.

components.name: P14Q1
components.title: Does the case have any medical conditions

components.name: P15Q11
components.title: If yes, please give further details

components.name: P15Q13
components.title: If yes, please give further details

components.name: P15Q16
components.title: Asplenia or dysfunction of the spleen

components.name: P15Q17
components.title: Do you have any other condition, if so please specify

components.name: P16Q4
components.title: If yes, which trimester are they in

components.name: P16Q5
components.title: If yes, what is their estimated delivery date

components.name: P17Q1
components.title: Has the case received the flu vaccine this season

components.name: P17Q2
components.title: If yes, what date was the vaccination

components.name: P18Q1
components.title: Is there anything else they would like to tell us about

items.text: A person on behalf of the case

field.name: GSQ1
field.display: Are you completing this form on behalf of someone else

value.display: A person on behalf of the case

field.name: P4Q10
field.display: Have you had contact with a confirmed or suspected case in the 7 days before symptom onset or a positive test

field.name: P6Q1
field.display: In the 7 days before before symptom onset or a positive test did the case travel

field.name: P9Q1
field.display: Has the case shown any symptoms

field.name: P12Q7
field.display: Did the case receive other antivirals in the last 14 days

field.name: P14Q1
field.display: Do you have any medical conditions
